description: Try our easy to follow Brandy Baskets With Ice-Cream recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Brandy Baskets With Ice-Cream Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1l tub Woolworths ice cream honey caramel macadamia

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C. Line two baking trays with baking paper. Place glasses upside down onto bench and lightly grease bases.
Place butter, golden syrup and sugar in a small saucepan over medium heat. Stir until melted. Cool for 5 minutes. Add in flour and ginger.
Place 4 heaped teaspoons of mixture on one of the trays, spaced well apart. Bake for 5-6 minutes. Remove from oven and place second tray into oven. Cool for 1-2 minutes until starting to firm.
Using a flat spatula, carefully lift off the tray and drape over the upturned glasses.
Leave to cool completely. Remove when they have cooled and firmed. Repeat with second tray. To serve, purée raspberries with icing sugar until smooth. Sieve and discard seeds.
Fill brandy baskets with scoops of ice-cream, drizzle with raspberry coulis and top with mint.
